price: 128. Ozali na eloko moko te na kati ya likambo oyo, to akolimbisa(1) bango to akopesa bango etumbu, mpo ete bazali bato mabe.
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ شَيۡءٌ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَوۡ يُعَذِّبَهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: laysa laka mina al-amri shayon aw yatūba ʿalayhim aw yuʿadhibahum fa-innahum ẓālimūna
